textComponent.content:
Piotr Migdał /pjɔtr ˈmig.daw/ - a curious being, doctor of sorcery.

Professionally: I am open to ambitious challenges combining AI with the end-user experience.

Previously: Co-founder & CTO of Quantum Flytrap, deep learning consultant, data viz specialist, quantum physics PhD. More in my resume.

Personally: I dance balfolk and fusion. I do weekly sauna rituals, among trees, ponds and streams. A bit more in this post.

Here: I invite you to read my stuff, take a look at my projects, skim abstracts of my academic publications.

Socially: I love emails, and it is the preferred way to approach me, pmigdal@gmail.com. GitHub is my favorite social network, and here are my repos. See also my other accounts: personal Facebook, professional LinkedIn, semi-used Twitter, freshly-created Mastodon, and link-hoarding Pinboard.
